placeholderImages.description: An anime-style male game developer working on his computer in a cozy room at night, with multiple monitors showing game assets and code.
An anime-style female game developer working on her computer in a cozy room at night, with a neon 'GAME DEV' sign on the wall.
A cyberpunk samurai warrior standing in a futuristic city with neon lights.
A breathtaking futuristic cityscape with flying vehicles and towering neon-lit skyscrapers.
